sentences.en: The cull of up to 500 animals using tranquillizer darts followed by lethal injection would begin within two weeks, military spokesman Brigadier Andrew Nikolic said.
sentences.cn: 即将被捕杀的袋鼠最多有500只。 根据军方发言人Andrew Nikolic的话称，捕杀人员将使用装有镇静剂的投掷物抓捕这些袋鼠，随后再使用致命性注射品，整个杀猎工作将在两周内开始。

sentences.en: The patient is verry worried, so the doctor gives him a shot of tranquillizer.
sentences.cn: 由于病人烦躁不安, 医生为他打了一针镇静剂.

sentences.en: Use as in pharmacy industry synthetic tranquillizer and anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 在制药工业中用作合成镇静剂和麻醉剂.

trans.tran_cn: 镇定剂，使镇定的人[物]，安定药，止痛药
trans.tran_en: a drug used for making someone feel less anxious
